item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0877; 02:09PM; 305 W 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vdzfN0; San Pedro; Although firefighters initially saw smoke from the attic, the source of the fire was found to be on the first floor. Twenty-six firefighters extinguished the flames in 34 minutes, preventing the fire from climbing its way to the attic (only smoke). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E238 E248 RA101 RA848 T38 T48; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0877; 01:35PM; 305 W 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vdzfN0; San Pedro; Two-story apartment with smoke showing from the attic (fire appears to be spreading vertically from the first floor). Offensive mode.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E238 E248 RA101 RA848 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1267; 06:46PM; 823 E Superba Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jpTule; Venice; *Corrected Address* Upon arrival firefighters found a one-story home burning, and flames spreading a three-story home next door (825 E Superba Av). The first 42 firefighters extinguished flames in both homes in 36 minutes. Thankfully, all occupants were able to evacuate safely and no injuries were reported. LAFD Fire Investigators are on scene performing a fire-cause investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM22 E205 E26 E263 E269 E295 E43 E52 E59 E63 E67 E89 EA1 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA59 T27 T5 T63 T69 T95 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1267; 06:10PM; 833 E Superba Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jpTule; Venice; Single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E63 E67 RA43 RA59 T5 T63; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Rescue; INC#0730; 12:45PM; 3363 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rdHYxC; #ShermanOaks; Despite the rapid response of 39 LAFD Firefighters, including those specially trained, equipped and certified for Urban Search & Rescue operations, who utilized a Truck mounted aerial ladder, rope and harness system to safely extricate the adult male tree trimmer (trapped 50' above ground in an upside down position for an unknown time period), the man, now at ground level, has sadly been determined beyond medical help and is deceased at the scene. His affiliation with the site, and employer is unknown. Though energized electrical wires were in or near the (unknown type) tree, their role, if any, in the man's death is presently unknown. Media Inquiries: CAL-OSHA, Coroner.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 CM42 E108 E278 E288 E88 EM14 HR3 RA85 RA88 RA99 T78 T88 UR88; CH8; 17, 18; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#0730; 12:07PM; 3363 N Coldwater Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rdHYxC; #ShermanOaks; PRELIM: Unconscious adult male (tree trimmer?) trapped in an upside down position approximately 50' above ground level (yet undetermined type tree).; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E108 E278 E288 E88 EM14 HR3 RA85 RA99 T78 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0721; 12:21PM; 4433 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kn10Jw; #HydePark; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one upstairs apartment to the rear of a 2 story (apartments over commercial) building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 E215 E226 E26 E266 E34 E46 E66 E68 E94 RA34 RA826 RA94 T15 T26 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0721; 12:02PM; 4433 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kn10Jw; #HydePark; PRELIM: Fire to the rear of a 2 story apartments over commercial building; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E266 E34 E46 E66 E94 RA826 RA94 T26 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Cliff Rescue; INC#1163; 03:55PM; 1605 N Gilcrest Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jlOMoM; #BeverlyCrest; LAFD ground crews hiked the steep hillside to successfully search for and find the 5 year-old male, who fell a yet to be determined distance. He is conscious with unspecified injuries or medical condition, and will soon be lowered via an LAFD rope system to a property below, where he will be loaded into an LAFD ground ambulance, and accompanied by his mother for transport to a regional trauma center.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 BC9 E108 E227 E237 E27 EM9 HR3 RA78 RH114 T27 T37 UR88; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1135; 03:51PM; 3750 S Glendon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v1tORy; #Palms; *Address Correction* From Venice Blvd to Glendon Ave. 64 LAFD Firefighters, assisted by Culver City FD in Automatic Aid, took just 28 minutes in offensive firefighting operations to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one 3rd (top) floor unit at a 3 story garden-style apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E263 E292 E43 E58 E62 T63 T92 + Culver City FD in Automatic Aid; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
